key.title: Ship Tombola
key.daily_bonus_description: A set of ships has been selected for you, click on the dice to choose a ship from the set. The nth number on the dice points to the nth ship from the left.
key.footer.issues_notice: If there are issues contact me via
key.footer.data_notice: The ship data has been got from
key.dialog.tiers.title: Tier Levels
key.dialog.tiers.content:
If you click on the tier levels or check marks, all ships at the tier level will be selected or deselected.

While the normal tier levels are described with Roman numerals, super ships are marked with a ★.
key.dialog.nations.title: Nations
key.dialog.nations.content:
When you click on the flags or check boxes you will select or deselect the nations ships.

: Japan

: United States

: Soviet Union

: Germany

: United Kingdom

: France

: Pan Asia

: Italy

: Commonwealth

: Pan America

: Europe

: Netherlands

: Spain
key.dialog.types.title: Ship classes
key.dialog.types.content:
If you click on the ship classes or check boxes, all ships of the class will be selected or deselected.

Here is the explanation of the class abbreviations:

SS: Submarine (SS)

DD: Destroyer (DD)

CL: Light Cruiser (CL)

CA: Heavy Cruiser (CA)

BC: Battlecruiser (BC)

BB: Battleship (BB)

CV: Aircraft carrier (CV)
key.dialog.pathnotes.title: Whats new?
key.dialog.pathnotes.content:
Version: 1.1.9-14.3:

- The Tombola is normal again

- New Ships: ZF-6 Goulden, Gambia, Alberico da Barbiano, Blücher, Suzuya, Valpariso, Eskimo
key.dialog.teamkrado.title: Who is Teamkrado?
key.dialog.teamkrado.content:
Teamkrado is an official contributor for World of Warships. In the streams and videos, Krado is the "camera" for the viewers.
Occasionally, Nere, another member of Teamkrado, is also the peephole into the game world.
Also involved are Krom and Blackchi, the latter plays with Krado Hunt Showdown and War Thunder.
In World of Warships or War Thunder, Krado lets his community go along as long as there are spots available in the division.

Teamkrado can be watched here:

Youtube channel

Twitch channel

Instagram Account

Facebook Account
key.dialog.loginfail.title: Login failed
key.dialog.loginfail.content: The login at wargaming failed, please try again.
key.dialog.loading.title: Loading data
key.dialog.loading.content: Loading Data from Wargaming API...
key.dialog.errorships.title: Warning
key.dialog.errorships.content:
At least one ship could not be selected. The Wargaming API did not send any information in this cases.

Ship IDs which could not be loaded:
key.dialog.swbattleships.title: Universe of Battleships
key.dialog.swbattleships.content:
Universe of Battleships is my attempt to develop a game that combines the game style of World of Warships with various Sci-Fi universes. The game is a fan game and in not connected with official trademarks and can therefore only be played in private once it is finished...

The Universes i plan to built in: Star Wars, Star Trek, Halo, Stargate, Transformers and an own idea.
key.dialog.rawedit.title: RAWEdit
key.dialog.rawedit.content: RAWEdit is a modification for the strategy game Star Wars: Empire at War. The mod has replaced or expanded almost everything from the original game and added a bunch of new units. The new update for the mod currently needs a while ;).
key.dialog.unitseditor.title: Units Editor
key.dialog.unitseditor.content: The Units Editor is a useful tool for modding Star Wars: Empire at War.

key.dialog.chooseserver.title: Choose Server
key.dialog.chooseserver.content: Choose your World of Warships server:
key.pick_pairs: Click on the button and find pairs of cards
key.memorize: Memorize the cards you have a timespan of 2,5 seconds
key.pick_pairs_2: Find pairs of cards to draw a ship
key.memory_game_over: Done! Click the button to restart. Last Ship:
key.do_not_cheat_content: You tried to cheat, please dont do that. It will have consequences the next time.
key.cheat_penalty_content: I said there will be consequences! The memory will be randomized again, HAHAHA!
key.dialog.memory_rules.title: Memory Rules
key.dialog.memory_rules.content:
1. Do not cheat, Thanks.

2. Cards revealed in the previous round should not be the first to be revealed in the new round. A violation will be severely punished.

3. Dont open cards too fast
key.dialog.not_enough_ships.title: Not enough ships
key.dialog.not_enough_ships.content: You have not selected enough ships. Select at least 8 ships to play the memory mode.
key.dialog.timeout_warning.title: Slow down
key.dialog.timeout_warning.content: Hey, slow down a bit. Look at the ships carefully before revealing new ones. Do this more times and there will be a penalty.
key.dialog.timeout_penalty.title: I SAID SLOWER!
key.dialog.timeout_penalty.content: Now you have to draw a ship chosen by me!
key.dialog.new_version.title: New Version Available
key.dialog.new_version.content: A new version is available, click "Reload" to load the new version of the Tombola.
